channel.title: ASF JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [BOOKKEEPER-425] Cleanup Bookie id generation
item.description: Bookie id generation (InetAddress.getLocalHost().getHostAddress() + ":" + port) is scattered all over the place. It would be better to have it centrallized somewhere in a static call.

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.

comments.comment: Created static in Bookie to generate InetSocketAddress from conf. StringUtils can be used to convert to a String.
The patch does not apply cleanly to trunk. Bookie.java and AutoRecoveryMain.java have conflicts. Do you want me to fix the conflicts, Ivan?
AuditorLedgerCheckTest still has a conflict. I'm not sure why the conflict was not there before.
did you update your source? applies fine for me.
I just did another update and still got a conflict on that test. I'm not sure what's wrong...

I just tried this patch in my environment. Applied cleanly for me with clean update. 

uma@uma-PC /cygdrive/e/BK-trunk
$ cat 0001-BOOKKEEPER-425-Cleanup-up-address-generation.patch |patch -p0

@Flavio, could you please clean your source and update once? Not sure what might be the actual cause in your env.
I was trying with eclipse and it was giving me a conflict. I tried from the command line and it worked, but now I'm getting a lot of test failures. Do tests pass for you?
Tests were failing because I had a stray zookeeper instance running. The patch is good, so I committed. Thanks, Ivan. Committed revision 1402526.

Integrated in bookkeeper-trunk #777 (See https://builds.apache.org/job/bookkeeper-trunk/777/)
BOOKKEEPER-425: Cleanup Bookie id generation (ivank via fpj) (Revision 1402526)

Result = UNSTABLE
